summary: This document is an email chain from December 3, 2019, showing internal FBI communications regarding a press inquiry from a Norwegian journalist. The journalist, Runa Fjellanger of VG newspaper, asks the FBI to confirm a quote attributed to an anonymous FBI agent in Stockholm about wanting to speak with an individual (name redacted) connected to Jeffrey Epstein via flight logs. The email chain shows the inquiry being forwarded within the FBI's National Press Office and New York field office.

persons.name: Runa Fjellanger
persons.context: Norwegian journalist from VG newspaper who emailed the FBI's National Press Office to inquire about a quote attributed to an anonymous FBI agent regarding an individual connected to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Tina D. Jagerson
persons.context: FBI Office of Public Affairs (OPA) recipient of the forwarded press inquiry about Jeffrey Epstein and a Norwegian individual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the FBI investigation; the press inquiry concerns an individual who reportedly traveled on Epstein's private jet.

connections.description: According to the journalist's inquiry, the redacted individual traveled with Jeffrey Epstein's private jet several times, as per flight logs.

events.title: Norwegian Press Inquiry to FBI
events.description: Journalist Runa Fjellanger emails the FBI's National Press Office seeking confirmation and details about a reported FBI interest in a Norwegian individual connected to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Stockholm, Sweden (location of the anonymous FBI agent mentioned)
Norway (country of origin for the journalist and subject of inquiry)
Washington, DC (location of FBI National Press Office)
New York, NY (location of FBI NY field office)
keyFacts: A Norwegian journalist contacted the FBI in December 2019 seeking confirmation of a quote from an anonymous FBI agent in Stockholm stating the FBI wanted to speak with a specific Norwegian individual regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The inquiry references flight logs indicating the individual traveled on Jeffrey Epstein's private jet multiple times.
The email chain shows the inquiry was internally forwarded within the FBI, from the National Press Office to the New York field office, indicating an active line of questioning.

The journalist also asks if there has been any contact between U.S. agencies and Norwegian authorities (Police Security Service, government) concerning Epstein or Crown Princess Mette-Marit, suggesting a potential Norwegian connection being explored.
